summary: When Quantrill's (Quantrell) gang is almost destroyed two of the captured members agree to join the Arizona Rangers to help finish the job.
cast: Audie Murphy|Michael Dante|Ben Cooper|Buster Crabbe|Gloria Talbott|Ray Stricklyn|George Keymas|Fred Krone|Willard W. Willingham|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Fred Graham|Booth Colman|Robert Shelton
title: El renegado de Arizona
